column4: I'm having some issues trying to get Cryptkeeper to show its notification icon in the systray. Using Gnome Panel versus Unity, for starters. Tried to whitelist the systray to 'all' in dconf-editor, logged out and back in, no dice. Any ideas what else to try?
you are using gnome-panel? the default panel in 12.04 doesn't have the notification area, so you would need to add it (alt+right click, add to panel)
the whitelist is only for unity
